channel.title: How can I delate my Black Mesa account?
channel.description: Trully, after all this time, I still without understand how is possible that this forum still without any kind of free choise to delate my account. I have asked this three times and your bastards still without answer to me... I hope with this "Bastards" you could banned me or something, cause I am totally tired of be part of this forum. And trully each time that I seek this option at the settings, I just can't find the button or something if it exists. And I really hate a web that force to me be part of a shit.

item.title: How can I delate my Black Mesa account?
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
This is the thread that never ends, and it goes on and on my friends…

Read full topic
item.source: How can I delate my Black Mesa account?

item.title: How can I delate my Black Mesa account?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Interestingly, you say you don’t want to be part of this forum anymore in your first post but you’ve made MULTIPLE posts since then. Do you want to be part of this forum or don’t you?

Read full topic
item.source: How can I delate my Black Mesa account?

item.title: How can I delate my Black Mesa account?
item.dc:creator: Twinsen
item.description:
Hubicorn:
Twinsen:

Trully, after all this time, I still without understand how is possible that this forum still without any kind of free choise to delate my account. I have asked this three times and your bastards still without answer to me… I hope with this “Bastards” you could banned me or something, cause I am totally tired of be part of this forum. And trully each time that I seek this option at the settings, I just can’t find the button or something if it exists. And I really hate a web that force to me be part of a shit.

You could always just leave, as others mentioned. However, is there a deeper reason as to why you want your account removed? This won’t remove all your threads and posts on this board unless you request that as well. Is that what you want? Do you want to remove any traces of yourself?

Yeap I want that. And I think that you did it in fact, so thanks for that, if that is just the only think that you can do.

sersoft:
Hubicorn:

Do you want to remove any traces of yourself?[/size]

The only way to leave Black Mesa for good is to give up your old life and go into the United States Federal Witness Protection Program[/size].

GilCMassey:

See, this is why you read the terms and conditions. You’d know that by signing up, you commit to a blood oath binding you to Nihilanth. Once commited, death is the only way to leave us, and even then, we all go to the fiery pits of the testing chamber.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I delate my Black Mesa account?

item.title: How can I delate my Black Mesa account?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
You realize you could just… leave and not come back without having your account deleted if you want, right? Like, you are allowed to just stop coming here.
How is anybody forcing you to stay?

Read full topic
